CHAT.comment: CENTRAL GREEN CO., Petitioner v. UNITED STATES
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:00 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TIMOTHY JONES ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF DAVID C. FREDERICK ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF TIMOTHY JONES ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:59 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
